content: I think a cucumber slice or wheel would be a great garnish for the Cucumber Lime Refresher, it's a classic choice and will complement the flavors of the drink nicely. I might also add a sprig of fresh mint to give it a bit of extra freshness. Since I've been experimenting with different flavor combinations, I was thinking of trying out a new recipe for a vegan quinoa salad that I found online. Do you have any tips on how to cook quinoa perfectly?
